item.title: CTF Hacker101 Flag 1 - A Little Something to Get You Started
item.description:
Another challange I do while learning programming, this is episode 1 by the way.

You can visit hacker101 if you want to play it too.

I start the level and it redirected me to a website with white background and a paragraph which said:

Welcome to level 0. Enjoy your stay.

Nothing out of ordinary here. So, I inspect the page and look at the source code. Seems normal. Until I take a look at the <style> tag and saw the following lines:
